headline: Masco Corporation: The Last Remaining Hurdle Is The DIY Segment
summary: Masco Corp. offsets tariff risks with pricing power, brand strength, and Pro paint growth via Home Depot, though DIY demand stays weak. Read why MAS stock is a hold.
